Class Glider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.univr.beedeedee.gameOfLife.GameOfLife
        • it.univr.beedeedee.gameOfLife.Glider

    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Glider
extends GameOfLife
    Glider.java
    Version:
    1.0

    Glider

    La classe Glider estende la classe GameOfLife e crea un BDD per il pattern Glider.

    Author:
    Damiano Pasotto VR397209 mailto: damiano.pasotto@studenti.univr.it, Lara Scarpari VR401241 mailto: lara.scarpari@studenti.univr.it
